verses.verse: And the <S%H1486>lot<s%> for the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%> was unto the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%>, even to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin<s%> <S%H5045>southward<s%>, at the uttermost <S%H7097>part<s%> of the <S%H8486>south<s%>.

And their <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%> was from the uttermost <S%H7097>part<s%> of the <S%H4417>Salt<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%>, from the <S%H3956>bay<s%> that <S%H6437>looketh<s%> <S%H5045>southward<s%>;

and it went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H5045>southward<s%> of the <S%H5045>ascent<s%> of <S%H4610>Akrabbim<s%>, and <S%H5674>passed<s%> along to <S%H6790>Zin<s%>, and went <S%H5927>up<s%> by the south of <S%H6947>Kadesh-barnea<s%>, and <S%H5674>passed<s%> along by <S%H2696>Hezron<s%>, and went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H146>Addar<s%>, and turned <S%H5437>about<s%> to <S%H7173>Karka<s%>;

and it <S%H5674>passed<s%> along to <S%H6111>Azmon<s%>, and went <S%H3318>out<s%> at the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; and the goings <S%H8444>out<s%> of the <S%H1366>border<s%> were at the <S%H3220>sea<s%>: this shall be your <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%>.

And the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%> was the <S%H4417>Salt<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%>, even unto the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>. And the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>quarter<s%> was from the <S%H3956>bay<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> at the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>;

and the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H1031>Beth-hoglah<s%>, and <S%H5674>passed<s%> along by the <S%H6828>north<s%> of <S%H1026>Beth-arabah<s%>; and the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H68>stone<s%> of <S%H932>Bohan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>;

and the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H1688>Debir<s%> from the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H5911>Achor<s%>, and so <S%H6828>northward<s%>, <S%H6437>looking<s%> toward <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>, that is over <S%H5227>against<s%> the <S%H4608>ascent<s%> of <S%H131>Adummim<s%>, which is on the south <S%H5045>side<s%> of the <S%H5158>river<s%>; and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> along to the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H5885>En-shemesh<s%>, and the goings <S%H8444>out<s%> thereof were at <S%H5883>En-rogel<s%>;

and the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> by the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom<s%> unto the <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%> <S%H5045>southward<s%> (the same is <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>); and the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> that lieth <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%>, which is at the <S%H7097>uttermost<s%> part of the <S%H6010>vale<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%>;

and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H8388>extended<s%> from the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> unto the <S%H4599>fountain<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H5318>Nephtoah<s%>, and went <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6085>Ephron<s%>; and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H8388>extended<s%> to <S%H1173>Baalah<s%> (the same is <S%H7157>Kiriath-jearim<s%>);

and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5437>turned<s%> about from <S%H1173>Baalah<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%> unto <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, and <S%H5674>passed<s%> along unto the <S%H3802>side<s%> of <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H3297>Jearim<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> (the same is <S%H3693>Chesalon<s%>), and went <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H1053>Beth-shemesh<s%>, and passed <S%H5674>along<s%> by <S%H8553>Timnah<s%>;

and the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> unto the <S%H3802>side<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%>; and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H8388>extended<s%> to <S%H7942>Shikkeron<s%>, and passed <S%H5674>along<s%> to <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1173>Baalah<s%>, and went <S%H3318>out<s%> at <S%H2995>Jabneel<s%>; and the goings <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H1366>border<s%> were at the <S%H3220>sea<s%>.

And the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%> was to the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H1366>thereof<s%>. This is the border of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>.

And unto <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> a <S%H2506>portion<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H413>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, even <S%H7151>Kiriath-arba<s%>, which <S%H704>Arba<s%> was the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak<s%> (the same is <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>).

And <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H3423>drove<s%> out thence the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak<s%>: <S%H8344>Sheshai<s%>, and <S%H289>Ahiman<s%>, and <S%H8526>Talmai<s%>, the <S%H3211>children<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak<s%>.
And he went <S%H5927>up<s%> thence against the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1688>Debir<s%>: now the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H1688>Debir<s%> <S%H6440>beforetime<s%> was <S%H7158>Kiriath-sepher<s%>.

And <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, He that <S%H5221>smiteth<s%> <S%H7158>Kiriath-sepher<s%>, and <S%H3920>taketh<s%> <S%H5414>it<s%>, to him will I give <S%H5915>Achsah<s%> my <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to <S%H802>wife<s%>.

And <S%H6274>Othniel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7073>Kenaz<s%>, the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H3612>Caleb<s%>, <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H5414>it<s%>: and he gave him <S%H5915>Achsah<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to <S%H802>wife<s%>.

And it came to <S%H935>pass<s%>, when she came unto <S%H5496>him<s%>, that she moved him to <S%H7592>ask<s%> of her <S%H1>father<s%> a <S%H7704>field<s%>: and she alighted from <S%H6795>off<s%> her <S%H2543>ass<s%>; and <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, What wouldest thou?

And she <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5414>Give<s%> me a <S%H1293>blessing<s%>; for that thou hast <S%H5414>set<s%> me in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H5045>South<s%>, <S%H5414>give<s%> me also <S%H1543>springs<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>. And he <S%H5414>gave<s%> her the <S%H5942>upper<s%> <S%H1543>springs<s%> and the <S%H8482>nether<s%> <S%H1543>springs<s%>.
This is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>.

And the <S%H7097>uttermost<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> toward the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%> in the <S%H5045>South<s%> were <S%H6909>Kabzeel<s%>, and <S%H5740>Eder<s%>, and <S%H3017>Jagur<s%>,

and <S%H3822>Lebaoth<s%>, and <S%H7978>Shilhim<s%>, and <S%H5871>Ain<s%>, and <S%H7417>Rimmon<s%>: all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8672>nine<s%>, with their <S%H2691>villages<s%>.
and <S%H8189>Shaaraim<s%>, and <S%H5723>Adithaim<s%>, and <S%H1449>Gederah<s%>, and <S%H1453>Gederothaim<s%>; <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages<s%>.
from <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> even unto the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, all that were <S%H3027>by<s%> the side of <S%H795>Ashdod<s%>, with their <S%H2691>villages<s%>.

Ashdod <S%H795><s%>, its <S%H1323>towns<s%> and its <S%H2691>villages<s%>; <S%H5804>Gaza<s%>, its <S%H1323>towns<s%> and its <S%H2691>villages<s%>; unto the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and the border <S%H1366>thereof<s%>.
and <S%H2547>Humtah<s%>, and <S%H7153>Kiriath-arba<s%> (the same is <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>), and <S%H6730>Zior<s%>; <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages<s%>.
Kiriath-baal <S%H7154><s%> (the same is <S%H7157>Kiriath-jearim<s%>), and <S%H7237>Rabbah<s%>; <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages<s%>.
and <S%H5044>Nibshan<s%>, and the City of <S%H5898>Salt<s%>, and <S%H5872>En-gedi<s%>; <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages<s%>.

And as for the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%>, the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not drive them <S%H3423>out<s%>: but the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.
